title: client broken...AGAIN
body:
so sick of this. music stays on in the background. login screen is completely black. im so tired of deleting lol and then redownloading it again and AGAIN just for it to happen like 3 weeks later. i delete the air client and that works but it just takes so LONG. 5 hours download, r u kidding me????????????????
this is the 11th time it has happened. WHAT DO I DO?

replies.body: In Properties > Compatibility, check "Disable Display Scaling on high DPI settings", "Run as administrator", and then uncheck compatibility mode.
done it and it didnt fix before i deleted the air client. oh well
